Beads /  Acrylic /  Multicolored /  Flat Round/Coin /  25mm & Up /  H20-6447PB

Bead, acrylic, multicolored, 32mm double-sided flat round with rainbow swirl design and 1.75mm hole. Sold per pkg of 6.

As Low As $0.24 per bead
1 - 14 15 - 49 50 - 99 100+
$3.46 $2.49 $1.71 $1.44

- IN STOCK -

All products (except FREE items) apply to your discount level.
More Details.

Add to Favorites

Item Number: H20-6447PB   Have a question about this item?

An affordable alternative to glass beads, the lightweight acrylic double-sided flat round beads feature a colorful rainbow swirl design. Colors can include red, orange, yellow, green, blue and more.

Safe Shopping

Products sold by Fire Mountain Gems and Beads® are intended for experienced jewelry-makers and designer-artists; children 14 years of age or younger should use these products with adult direction.
